plot outline: A bold young man is faced with several difficult circumstances since childhood, and as a consequence, he adopts a life of violence and crime. Given the right incentive and opportunity, can he reform himself and become a productive and law-abiding member of society?
title: Bilindar
plot: A bold young man is faced with several difficult circumstances since childhood, and as a consequence, he adopts a life of violence and crime. Given the right incentive and opportunity, can he reform himself and become a productive and law-abiding member of society?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
